div.style: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f9fa 100%); border: 2px solid #0a4b78; border-radius: 12px; padding: 2rem; margin: 1rem 0;
div.p: Choisissez une action et ajoutez obligatoirement un commentaire

div.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 2rem;

button.name: action_approve
button.style: padding: 1.5rem !important; font-size: 18px !important; background-color: #4caf50 !important; color: white !important; border: none !important; border-radius: 10px !important; cursor: pointer !important; font-weight: 700 !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.3) !important; text-align: center !important;

button.name: action_return
button.style: padding: 1.5rem !important; font-size: 18px !important; background-color: #ff9800 !important; color: white !important; border: none !important; border-radius: 10px !important; cursor: pointer !important; font-weight: 700 !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.3) !important; text-align: center !important;

button.name: action_reject
button.style: padding: 1.5rem !important; font-size: 18px !important; background-color: #f44336 !important; color: white !important; border: none !important; border-radius: 10px !important; cursor: pointer !important; font-weight: 700 !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.3) !important; text-align: center !important;

label.style: display: block; margin-bottom: 0.75rem; font-weight: 700; font-size: 15px; color: #1a1a1a;

field.name: comment
field.placeholder: Saisissez votre commentaire ou vos instructions de correction...
field.style: width: 100%; min-height: 150px; padding: 1rem; border: 2px solid #dee2e6; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 15px; resize: vertical;
